info.title: OPERA Cloud Cashiering API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Cashiering related functionality in OPERA Cloud.

Cashiering provides access to a guest folio, posting journals, receipt histories, currency calculations, credit card settlements, and check a guest out.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 21.5.0.0.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2022 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
You can use this API to get Deposit Folio Transaction Details.

OperationId:getDepositFolioTransactionDetails

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel

parameters.name: includeGenerates
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if the automatically generated transactions, related to the main transaction number above, are also to be retrieved as part of this request.

parameters.name: transactionNo
parameters.description: Unique Transaction Number of the transaction(posting) for which details are required.

parameters.name: includeExchangeInformation
parameters.description: Flag to indicate what currency exchange information text needs to be included in response.

200.description: Response for the fetch transaction details request. Detail information regarding the folio transaction will be returned

get.description:
You can use this API to get Financial postings.

OperationId:getFinancialPostings

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: cashierId
parameters.description: Cashier Id of the Cashier.

parameters.name: referenceNumberWildCard
parameters.description: Filters the results for reference number.

parameters.name: checkNumberWildCard
parameters.description: Filter the results for Cheque number's code.

parameters.name: supplementWildCard
parameters.description: Filter the results for supplement.

parameters.name: approvalCode
parameters.description: Filters the results for approval code.

parameters.name: folioWindowNo
parameters.description: Filters the result to only include transactions in this window number.

parameters.name: attachCreditCardToProfile
parameters.description: Attach the credit card to profile.

parameters.name: cardOrToken
parameters.description: Simple type for indicating if credit card number is tokenized.

parameters.name: cardType
parameters.description: This is required for Credit Card Payment Methods. This indicates the type of Credit Card associated with this payment method.

parameters.name: expirationDate
parameters.description: Expiration date of the credit card

parameters.name: expirationDateMasked
parameters.description: Masked Expiration date of the credit card

parameters.name: userDefinedCardType
parameters.description: Indicates the user defined credit card type if credit card type from a defined list is not provided

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: idContext
parameters.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unique ID Type (UIT).

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: A monetary amount.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

parameters.name: approvalAmountNeededAmount
parameters.description: A monetary amount.

parameters.name: approvalAmountNeededCurrencyCode
parameters.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

parameters.name: closureNo
parameters.description: Filters the result to only display the postings that were made during the cashier closure range

200.description: Response for fetching the Posting Journal.

get.description:
You can use this API to get Hotel Revenue.

OperationId:getHotelRevenue

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description: Business date.

200.description: Response object for hotel room revenue for all HHonors redemption reservation.

get.description:
You can use this API to retrieve a list of Transaction Codes configured for a property.

OperationId:getTransactionCodes

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Event being generated by a Supplemental Folio.

parameters.name: includeArticles
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if Article Codes are required, along with the parent Transaction Codes.

parameters.name: userRoleTransactions
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if it is allowed to manually post transaction codes.

parameters.name: manualPostAllowed
parameters.description: Flag to include the search for Manual Post Allowed.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Lookup string which will try to match an existing Transaction Codes.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Lookup string which will try to match an existing Transaction Code Description.

parameters.name: fiscalBillNo
parameters.description: The Fiscal Bill number of this posting

parameters.name: folioDate
parameters.description: Date of Folio Generation.

parameters.name: folioNo
parameters.description: Folio Number.

parameters.name: folioStatus
parameters.description: The Folio Status Example: DEPOSIT folio, VOID folio or the default OK folio status.

parameters.name: folioTypeName
parameters.description: The name of the Folio Type used for the Folio Number sequence.

parameters.name: internalFolioWindowID
parameters.description: Internal window ID which is unique to the reservation. This ID can only be used for reference.

parameters.name: invoiceNo
parameters.description: Invoice No after the folio is generated. Same invoice number may be referred in multiple folios

200.description: Response that contains either the Transaction Code list if fetch was successful or error(s) if not.

get.description:
You can use this API to get Guests Transactions.

OperationId:getGuestsTransactions

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel

parameters.name: reservationList
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: includeGenerates
parameters.description: Configuring this flag to be TRUE will return transactions that are auto generated like taxes.

parameters.name: includeTransactionsWithARInvoiceNo
parameters.description: Configuring this flag to be TRUE will return transactions that are included in an Accounts Receivable invoice.

parameters.name: includeTransactionsWithFolioNo
parameters.description: Configuring this flag to be TRUE will return transactions that already belongs to a folio.

parameters.name: includeTransactionsWithManualPostingOnly
parameters.description: Configuring this flag to be TRUE will return transactions whose transaction codes have manual posting enabled, or when an adjustment code is attached to the transaction code, the adjustment code's manual posting is enabled.

parameters.name: idContext
parameters.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unique ID Type (UIT).

parameters.name: transactionNo
parameters.description: Transaction number of the payment being corrected.

parameters.name: transactionGroup
parameters.description: Category of the transaction code to filter the result.

parameters.name: transactionSubGroup
parameters.description: Sub category of the transaction code to filter the result.

parameters.name: billingCode
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Billing Instruction.

parameters.name: billingHotelId
parameters.description: Hotel context of the Billing Instruction.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Billing Instruction code description.

parameters.name: routingInstructionsId
parameters.description: This is the Routing Instruction Id attached with Reservation. It is only used for internal purpose. It should not be used by external vendor or consumer.

parameters.name: trxCodeWildCard
parameters.description: Lookup string which will try to match an existing Transaction Code/s.

parameters.name: trxDescriptionWildCard
parameters.description: Lookup string which will try to match an existing Transaction Code's Description.

parameters.name: checkNumberWildCard
parameters.description: Lookup string which will try to match an existing Cheque number's code.

parameters.name: referenceNumberWildCard
parameters.description: Filters the results for reference number.

parameters.name: supplementWildCard
parameters.description: Filter the results for supplement.

parameters.name: windowNo
parameters.description: Filters the result to only include transactions in this window number.

parameters.name: cashieringTransactionType
parameters.description: Wrapper Transaction Type.

parameters.name: cashierId
parameters.description: Cashier Id of the Cashier.

parameters.name: commissionable
parameters.description: Filters the result based on its commission property. Do not set this criteria if all transactions should be included whether or not they are commissionable.

parameters.name: serviceRecoveryAllowed
parameters.description: Filters the result which are allow for service recovery.

parameters.name: postedTransactionType
parameters.description: Returns only postings without bill number.

200.description: Lists a summary of transactions of guests.

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

depositFolioTransactionDetails.description: Response for the fetch transaction details request. Detail information regarding the folio transaction will be returned

trxCodesInfo.description: Transaction codes information which are in response postings.

depositDetailPostingsType.description: List of Deposit Postings with details.

referenceTransactionNo.description: Generate transaction number for the Posting.

checkCount.description: Check number count for the posting.

price.description: Indicates the unit price of the consumption.

transactionType.description: This is the transaction type which says whether it is a Consumption(C), Payment (FC) or Package (PK) and it is inherited from transaction code.

creditAmount.description: The amount posted as credit to the ledger.

debitAmount.description: The amount posted as debit to the ledger.

articleCode.description: Information regarding the Article(Using Articles Functionality) of this transaction.

paidOut.description: Indicates if this transaction is a paid out transaction.

arrangementCode.description: Corrected arrangement code from the package associated to this transaction.

rateCode.description: Rate code associated to this transaction.

compRedemptionCode.description: Comp redemption code assiciated to the transaction.

updateInfo.description: Update info associated to this transaction.

fbaCertificate.description: Flag indicates that the posting is Flexible Benefits Awards Certificate

taxInvoiceNo.description: Tax invoice number generated by payment tax.

compPostingsInfo.description: Comp Postings information for the folio.

financialTransactionIdList.description: Collection of unique identifiers of the financial transactions.

exchange.description: Available when the Fetch Folio Search Type requests the amounts to be converted to a currency different from the Resort currency.

stampDuty.description: Flag to identify a Stamp Duty Transaction.

customCharge.description: Flag to identify a Custom Charge.

revenueDate.description: The date on which the transaction has its revenue effect.

receiptNo.description: The receipt number of the transaction, if there is a receipt generated.

roundingDifferenceTrx.description: Indicator to determine if the posting was a posting for the Rounding Difference.

commissionable.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction is commissionable.

canAdjustInvoice.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction can be adjusted.

depositPolicy.description: Deposit Policy information if this payment was applied to a deposit policy.

comments.description: User defined comments for the deposit.

paymentMethod.description: Defined method of payment for this transaction.

receiptSummaryInfo.description: Information regarding receipt of the posted deposit

folioNo.description: The Folio number of this posting, if there was a Folio already generated.

transferred.description: Indicates if the deposit was transferred either to a reservation or from a reservation.

folioTypeName.description: The name of the Folio Type used for the Folio Number sequence.

currencyExchangeInfo.description: Currency exchange information if the posting was made using a currency different from the default currency.

internalFolioWindowID.description: Internal Unique id for the Folio Window.

currencyAmountType.description: A monetary value expressed with a currency code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

cashierInfoType.description: Cashier information. Contains Id and Name details of the cashier.

postingGroupType.description: Transaction group information. Ever posting could represent a. Regular transaction b. Group header - has Group Id, Count, Descripton and Includes Group Memebers elements c. Group transaction - has SubGroupId element pointing to Group Header Id

subGroupId.description: Indicates to which group transaction belongs.

authorizer.description: Authorizer name of the Comp Account.

approvalStatus.description: Approval status of the comp account.

uniqueIDListType.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

exchangeAmounts.description: Converted values for the Exchange Currency requested.

debitAmount.description: The converted Guest Ledger Debit Amount.

creditAmount.description: The converted Guest Ledger Credit Amount.

resDepositPolicyType.description: A deposit policy attached with the reservation.

amountPaid.description: Total amount paid against the reservation deposit.

amountDue.description: Total amount due against the reservation deposit.

policyId.description: Unique ID of the Reservation Policy.

depositCancelRevenueType.description: The type to indicate what revenue is to be used for calculating deposit/cancellation amounts.

depositPolicyType.description: Used to define the deposit policy, guarantees policy, and/or accepted forms of payment.

amountPercent.description: Payment expressed as a fixed amount, or a percentage of/or room nights.

description.description: Text description of the Payment in a given language.

depositReceiptNo.description: Receipt number associated with the deposit policy

transactionDate.description: Transaction Date associated with the deposit policy

depositReqReversed.description: Flag to indicate if deposit policy is reversed

formattedRule.description: Formatted Text Rule of the deposit policy.

typeOfCharges.description: Defines if the deposit amount is calculated based on Room Charges, Catering Charges or both

manual.description: Flag to indicate if the cancellation policy is manual.

policyAmountPercentType.description: Defines the percentage basis for calculating the fee amount or the amount.

basisType.description: Provides the basis for how the amount of the guarantee is calculated.

nights.description: The number of nights of the hotel stay that are used to calculate the fee amount.

percent.description: The percentage used to calculate the amount.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

absoluteDeadline.description: Defines the absolute deadline. Either this or the offset attributes may be used.

offsetFromArrival.description: The number of days before arrival that allows cancellation without penalties.

offsetDropTime.description: Time on offset day the cancellation penalties applies.

offsetFromBookingDate.description: The number of days after booking deposit must be paid.

emailFolioInfo.description: Information on an email for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

resPaymentCardType.description: Information on a credit card for the customer.

approvalCode.description: Approval code sent by the credit card company on a successful authorization.

cardType.description: Indicates the type of credit card from a defined list

userDefinedCardType.description: Indicates the user defined credit card type if credit card type from a defined list is not provided

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the credit card

expirationDateMasked.description: Masked Expiration date of the credit card

attachCreditCardToProfile.description: Attach the credit card to profile.

processing.description: This contains information on whether EFT is enabled. A value of 'C' indicates EFT is enabled and 'M' indicates manual authorization is available for this payment card type.

cardPresent.description: Flag to determine if the credit card was swiped/manually entered , This element is only used when PAYMENT SERVICE DIRECTIVE(PSD) Opera Control is active.

cardOrToken.description: This contains information on whether credit card is tokenized (token enabled). A value of 'Token' indicates credit card is token enabled and 'CardNumber' indicates non token environment for this payment card type.

citId.description: Customer Initiated Transaction(CIT) Id for Credit Cards. This is only used when PAYMENT SERVICES DIRECTIVE (PSD2) Opera Control is active.

cardTypeType.description: This is required for Credit Card Payment Methods. This indicates the type of Credit Card associated with this payment method.

cardNumberTypeType.description: Simple type for indicating if credit card number is tokenized.

authorizationRuleType.description: Configured rule for computing the amount to authorize.

amount.description: The amount applicable to the authorization rule.

percent.description: A percentage value if the authorization rule is percentage based.

emailType.description: Information on an email for the customer.

type.description: Defines the purpose of the e-mail address (e.g. personal, business, listserve).

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

taxInvoice.description: Tax Invoice Number of the Receipt.

payeeId.description: Opera name id of the payee.

payeeAccountInfo.description: AR account short info of the payee.

payeeTaxNumber.description: The tax number of the payee.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

isValidated.description: Indicator to define if the Address is validated by the Address Validation System.

addressLine.description: When the address is unformatted (FormattedInd="false") these lines will contain free form address details. When the address is formatted and street number and street name must be sent independently, the street number will be sent using StreetNmbr, and the street name will be sent in the first AddressLine occurrence.

cityName.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

cityExtension.description: Post Office City Extension Code number. City Extension mainly used for UK addresses.

county.description: County or District Name (e.g., Fairfax). This is read only.

type.description: Defines the type of address (e.g. home, business, other).

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

updateReservations.description: Indicates whether to update the reservations or not. If true and the address is primary, then all associated active reservations will be updated with the new primary address.

barCode.description: The postal barcode for the address.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

countryNameType.description: Code for a country or a nationality.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 200.

code.description: Code for a country or a nationality.

aRAccountShortInfoType.description: Accounts Receivabales Account details type charged for batched posting.

accountId.description: The unique ID for the Account.

accountNo.description: The Account Number for the Account.

aRAccountStatusType.description: Type for the Account Status. Status can be restricted and a message/description added to the Account.

restriction.description: The Restriction Code added on the Account. This is available when the functionality for adding restriction codes is ON.

description.description: User defined status message on the Account.

restricted.description: Flag to indicate if the Account is restricted.

referenceTransactionNo.description: Generate transaction number for the Posting.

checkCount.description: Check number count for the posting.

price.description: Indicates the unit price of the consumption.

transactionType.description: This is the transaction type which says whether it is a Consumption(C), Payment (FC) or Package (PK) and it is inherited from transaction code.

creditAmount.description: The amount posted as credit to the ledger.

debitAmount.description: The amount posted as debit to the ledger.

articleCode.description: Information regarding the Article(Using Articles Functionality) of this transaction.

paidOut.description: Indicates if this transaction is a paid out transaction.

arrangementCode.description: Corrected arrangement code from the package associated to this transaction.

rateCode.description: Rate code associated to this transaction.

compRedemptionCode.description: Comp redemption code assiciated to the transaction.

updateInfo.description: Update info associated to this transaction.

fbaCertificate.description: Flag indicates that the posting is Flexible Benefits Awards Certificate

taxInvoiceNo.description: Tax invoice number generated by payment tax.

compPostingsInfo.description: Comp Postings information for the folio.

financialTransactionIdList.description: Collection of unique identifiers of the financial transactions.

exchange.description: Available when the Fetch Folio Search Type requests the amounts to be converted to a currency different from the Resort currency.

stampDuty.description: Flag to identify a Stamp Duty Transaction.

customCharge.description: Flag to identify a Custom Charge.

revenueDate.description: The date on which the transaction has its revenue effect.

receiptNo.description: The receipt number of the transaction, if there is a receipt generated.

roundingDifferenceTrx.description: Indicator to determine if the posting was a posting for the Rounding Difference.

commissionable.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction is commissionable.

canAdjustInvoice.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction can be adjusted.

groupByCount.description: When some SummaryPostingsGroupBy element is send as request ,then this element will represent how many transactions rolled up into this Summary Posting Type.

folioWindowNo.description: The Folio Window number of this posting.

transactionCurrencyExchangeInfoType.description: Details of the Exchange Information for this transaction, if the posting was made in a currency different from the default currency.

description.description: Description or reference for this exchange.

exchangeRate.description: The Buying rate used for this transaction.

currencyAmount.description: The foreign currency amount posted for this transaction.

commissionPercent.description: Percentage for commission used for the currency conversion.

code.description: Foreign Currency Code of the currency which was used to post this transaction.

exchangeDate.description: The date when this exchange rate was set.

transactionSubGroup.description: Sub category of the transaction code.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the transaction code.

routingInstructionsId.description: This is the Routing Instruction Id attached with Reservation. It is only used for internal purpose. It should not be used by external vendor or consumer.

articles.description: The List of Articles defined for this transaction code, when using the Articles functionality.

trxServiceType.description: Contains service type for transaction code.

transactionCode.description: Unique identifier for the Transaction code.

hotelId.description: Hotel context of the Transaction code.

printTrxReceipt.description: Print receipt flag that tells whether the transaction receipt is to be printed or not. This is based on the transaction code.

transactionCode.description: Transaction code to which the article belongs.

postIt.description: Post it information of the article.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

hotelId.description: Hotel code to which the article belongs.

inactive.description: Indicates whether the article is inactive or not.

articlePostItType.description: Post it information of an article.

availableForPostIt.description: Indicates whether the article is available for post it.

color.description: Color indicator which is only configurable if article is available for post it.

colorType.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

financialPostings.description: Response for fetching the Posting Journal.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

financialPostingsType.description: Collection of Reservations and their information.

transactionCodes.description: Set of Transaction Codes configured in this time span.

totalDebit.description: Indicates the Total Sum of Journal Debits.

totalCredit.description: Indicates the Total Sum of Journal Credits.

overallTotal.description: Indicates the Total Sum of Journal entries in a page.

totalForAllPages.description: Indicates the Total Sum of all Journal entries in all pages.

totalEntriesCount.description: Indicates the number of journal entries.

referenceTransactionNo.description: Generate transaction number for the Posting.

checkCount.description: Check number count for the posting.

price.description: Indicates the unit price of the consumption.

transactionType.description: This is the transaction type which says whether it is a Consumption(C), Payment (FC) or Package (PK) and it is inherited from transaction code.

creditAmount.description: The amount posted as credit to the ledger.

debitAmount.description: The amount posted as debit to the ledger.

articleCode.description: Information regarding the Article(Using Articles Functionality) of this transaction.

paidOut.description: Indicates if this transaction is a paid out transaction.

arrangementCode.description: Corrected arrangement code from the package associated to this transaction.

rateCode.description: Rate code associated to this transaction.

compRedemptionCode.description: Comp redemption code assiciated to the transaction.

updateInfo.description: Update info associated to this transaction.

fbaCertificate.description: Flag indicates that the posting is Flexible Benefits Awards Certificate

taxInvoiceNo.description: Tax invoice number generated by payment tax.

compPostingsInfo.description: Comp Postings information for the folio.

financialTransactionIdList.description: Collection of unique identifiers of the financial transactions.

exchange.description: Available when the Fetch Folio Search Type requests the amounts to be converted to a currency different from the Resort currency.

stampDuty.description: Flag to identify a Stamp Duty Transaction.

customCharge.description: Flag to identify a Custom Charge.

revenueDate.description: The date on which the transaction has its revenue effect.

receiptNo.description: The receipt number of the transaction, if there is a receipt generated.

roundingDifferenceTrx.description: Indicator to determine if the posting was a posting for the Rounding Difference.

commissionable.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction is commissionable.

canAdjustInvoice.description: Indicator to determine if the transaction can be adjusted.

guestInfo.description: Details of the Guest information where this transaction was posted to.

profileId.description: Profile Id corresponding to the guest name. It is sometimes possible to have a guest name but the profile id is null.

reservationId.description: Reservation Id corresponding to the guest name. It is sometimes possible to have a room number but the reservation id is null.

guestName.description: Guest name associated with the transaction.

roomId.description: Room number associated with the transaction.

confirmationNo.description: Confirmation number associated with the transaction.

aRInfo.description: Details of the AR account if the posting was part of an AR invoice.

currencyExchangeInfo.description: Currency exchange information if the posting was made using a currency different from the default currency.

adjustmentInfo.description: Details regarding the adjustment made if the current transaction was created as a result of an adjustment.

paymentMethod.description: Defined method of payment for this transaction.

exchangeInformation.description: Exchange Information - text presentation of the exchange operation including formula, buy rate, etc.

folioNo.description: The Folio number of this posting, if there was a Folio already generated.

folioNoWithPrefix.description: The folio number with prefix value.

internalFolioWindowID.description: Internal Unique id for the Folio Window.

folioTypeName.description: The name of the Folio Type used for the Folio Number sequence.

fiscalBillNo.description: The Fiscal Bill number of this posting

profileId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unique ID Type (UIT).

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

reservationId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unique ID Type (UIT).

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

transactionARInfoType.description: Details of the AR account where this transaction was posted to.

accountName.description: The Account name where this invoice is sent.

invoiceNo.description: The invoice number which includes this transaction.

transactionAdjustmentInfoType.description: Adjustment details of the transaction, if the transaction was created as part of an adjustment.

hotelRevenueDetails.description: Response object for hotel room revenue for all HHonors redemption reservation.

roomRevenue.description: Total room revenue for this hotel.

houseRevenue.description: Total house revenue for this hotel.

compRevenue.description: Total comp revenue for this hotel.

occupiedRooms.description: Total occupied revenue for this hotel.

houseRooms.description: Total house rooms for this hotel.

compRooms.description: Total comp rooms for this hotel.

zeroRoomsRevenue.description: Total zero rooms revenue for this hotel.

currencyCode.description: The base currency code for this hotel.

transactionCodes.description: Response that contains either the Transaction Code list if fetch was successful or error(s) if not.

trxCodes.description: List of TransactionCode. Contains information on Transaction Code, TransactionCode Description Its Group and Sub Group.

transactionSubGroup.description: Sub category of the transaction code.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the transaction code.

routingInstructionsId.description: This is the Routing Instruction Id attached with Reservation. It is only used for internal purpose. It should not be used by external vendor or consumer.

articles.description: The List of Articles defined for this transaction code, when using the Articles functionality.

trxServiceType.description: Contains service type for transaction code.

transactionCode.description: Unique identifier for the Transaction code.

hotelId.description: Hotel context of the Transaction code.

printTrxReceipt.description: Print receipt flag that tells whether the transaction receipt is to be printed or not. This is based on the transaction code.

price.description: Default price of that transaction code.

minimumPrice.description: Minimum quantity needs to be posted.

guestsTransactions.description: Lists a summary of transactions of guests.

reservationFolioInformation.description: Folio details for the requested reservation/s.

trxCodesInfo.description: Transaction codes information which are in response folio.

reservationFolioInfoType.description: Each folio will include summary and/or detailed information.

folioWindows.description: The Folio Window information of the reservation.

folioHistory.description: Folio History element contains all generated folios

postStayChargeAllowed.description: Computed flag specifying that the reservation has met the criteria which allows charges to be posted after being checked-out.

preStayChargeAllowed.description: Computed flag specifying that the reservation has met the criteria which allows charges to be posted before checking-in.

autoCheckInAllowed.description: Flag specifying that the reservation can be auto check in when Auto Checkin Pseudo Room parameter is active.

postToNoShowCancelAllowed.description: Flag specifying that the reservation can post if the reservation status was No Show or Cancelled.

stampDutyExists.description: Stamp Duty posted in at least one folio window.

roomAndTaxPosted.description: Flag to check if the room and tax are already posted.

reservationInfoType.description: The Reservation class contains the current reservation being created or altered.

reservationIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the reservation for both internal and external systems

reservationGuest.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

sharedGuests.description: Collection of guests who share this reservation.

reservationPaymentMethod.description: Payment method used for this reservation

specials.description: Set of reservation preferences which belongs to the Specials group.

reservationIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the reservation

sourceOfSale.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

waitlist.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was waitlisted. This could hold information as history even if reservation is not in Waitlist status anymore.

queue.description: Information about the time and duration this reservation was on Queue for Checkin.

housekeeping.description: Information regarding housekeeping for this reservation.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

taxType.description: This stores the code for the type of tax calculation especially with tax exemption, etc.

revenuesAndBalances.description: Revenues and Balances Amount summary for the reservation.

hotelInterfaceStatusList.description: Collection of Hotel Interfaces and rights, this is populated only when fetching interface status for rooms.

mobileNotifications.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready, Key Ready messages.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

welcomeOffer.description: This flag will determine wheather the reservation is eligible for Welcome Offer or not.

cancellationInfo.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was cancelled.

date.description: Date when reservation was last cancelled.

keyCount.description: Number of keys created for the reservation.

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

walkInIndicator.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

accessRestriction.description: Indicates user restriction on the reservation based on the Access exclusion functionality such as Restriction on Changes, Cancellation or both.

commissionPayoutTo.description: If not null, reservation is considered to pay out commission to either Travel Agent, Source or both.

preRegistered.description: Defines if the reservation is pre-registered or not.

openFolio.description: Returns true when reservation has an open folio.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the â€˜trueâ€™ or â€˜falseâ€™ values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

optedForCommunication.description: Attribute OptedForCommunication is set to true when the guest has opted for receiving communicationsl related to the reservation.

reservationIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

stayInfoType.description: Details on the Room Stay including Guest Counts, Time Span of this Room Stay, pointers to Res Guests, guest Memberships, Comments and Special Requests pertaining to this particular Room Stay and finally financial information related to the Room Stay, including Guarantee, Deposit and Payment and Cancellation Penalties.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span covers the Room Stay dates of the original reservation.

expectedTimes.description: The expected arrival, return and departure times of the guest.

adultCount.description: A collection of Guest Counts associated with Room Stay.

childCount.description: A collection of Child Counts associated with Room Stay.

componentRoomType.description: True indicates room type is a component type.

points.description: The Points contains the number of points used to book a particular room type.

rateSuppressed.description: Whether this rate should be suppressed from view

reservationBlock.description: Key information about the block for this reservation.

fixedRate.description: True if the rate is a fixed rate, otherwise false

totalAmount.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay including additional occupant amounts and fees. If TaxInclusive is set to True, then taxes are included in the total amount.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

sourceCodeDescription.description: Description of the source of business.

roomTypeCharged.description: Room type code that was charged

depositPayments.description: A collection of deposit and/or payments for the Room Stay.

guestServiceStatus.description: Service Status of In House guest like DND or MUP

scheduledCheckoutTime.description: Indicates that this reservation is scheduled for automated check out.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a room number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a room number may be changed.

pseudoRoom.description: True indicates as pseudo room type. This is usually used for a posting master reservation.

assignedByAI.description: Represents the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

upgradedByAI.description: Represents the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

timeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

resExpectedTimesType.description: Holds the Arrival and Departure Time Information

pointsType.description: The Redeem Points contains the number of points required to book a room type.

awardsType.description: Awards type for the award type rate code.

points.description: No of points required to book this Room Stay.

reservationBlockType.description: Key information about the block for a reservation.

blockIdList.description: Collection of unique block identifiers for the reservation.

blockName.description: The Name of the block that is attached to the reservation.

hotelId.description: This is the HotelCode of the Block.

blockIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

resGuaranteeType.description: Validations type record returned after Validations are done.

promotionType.description: Type to specify a rate promotion. Usually attached to a reservation to indicate a specific promotion is applied to the reservation.

promotionCode.description: Promotion code associated with the rate plan.

promotionName.description: Promotion code Name associated with the rate plan.

couponCode.description: Promotion Coupon Code when promotion is setup to have a valid coupon code.

guestHousekeepingServiceRequestType.description: Possible values for the Guest Service Status.

resGuestInfoType.description: Specifies Company or Travel Agent profile using IATA or Corp. No.

membership.description: The Membership object identifying the frequent customer reward program.

namePrefix.description: Salutation of honorific. (e.g., Mr. Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenName.description: Given name, first name or names

alternateGivenName.description: Alternate given name, first name or names

middleName.description: The middle name of the person name

nameSuffix.description: Hold various name suffixes and letters (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Ret., Esq.).

nationality.description: Affiliation or ethnicity to a particular country.

vip.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer (e.g., VIP, numerical ranking).

address.description: Address information that is attached to the reservation guest

anonymization.description: Provides information about the guest's anonymization status

accompanyGuests.description: List of guest names that are accompanying the reservation guest

externalInfo.description: External information about the guest associated with the reservation.

guestLastStayInfo.description: Contains information regarding the last stay of this guest.

guestRestricted.description: True indicates there are restrictions associated with the current profile.

registrationCardNo.description: Unique identifier of the police registration card number.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

membershipInfoType.description: The Membership object identifies the frequent customer reward program.

membershipId.description: Membership ID (Unique ID from the memberships table).

programCode.description: The code or name of the membership program ('Hertz', 'AAdvantage', etc.).

bonusCode.description: The code or name of the bonus program. BonusCode can be used to indicate the level of membership (Gold Club, Platinum member, etc.)

membershipTypeDesc.description: The description of the ProgramCode.(Delta Previlige for code DP)

membershipLevelDesc.description: The description of the Bonus Code.(Platinum for code P)

accountId.description: The account identification number for this particular member in this particular program.

membershipLevel.description: The code or name of the membership level and indicates the level of membership (Gold Club, Platinum member, etc.). This is same as the BonusCode.

playerRanking.description: Ranking assigned to the Player Profile by the Gaming system.

namePrefixType.description: Salutation of honorific. (e.g., Mr. Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenNameType.description: Given name, first name or names

vIPType.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer.

addressSearchType.description: Address Details such as city, state, country, postal code etc.

cityName.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

streetAddress.description: First Line of Street Address. For profile search it matches the first Address line.

excludeNoCity.description: When true indicates that only profiles with city will be fetched.

anonymizationType.description: Provides information about guest's anonymization status.

anonymizationStatus.description: Status of anonymization such as Requested or Anonymized.

anonymizationDate.description: Date and Time when the guest was anonymized.

firstName.description: Given name, first name or names

fullName.description: String representation of the full name

registrationCardNo.description: Unique identifier of the police registration card number.

profileIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the Profile for both internal and external systems. In case of Travel Agent the IATA code and in case of Company can be any form of identifier as id.
Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

resGuestExternalInfoType.description: Specifies Company or Travel Agent profile using IATA or Corp. No.

givenName.description: Given name, first name or names

guestLastStayInfoType.description: Contains last stay related details of the guest.

lastStayRoom.description: Room Number where the guest stayed.

lastStayRate.description: The Rate amount of the guest's last stay.

totalStay.description: The total number of previous stay of the guest.

resSharedGuestInfoType.description: Contains information regarding the share reservation.

firstName.description: Given name, first name or names

fullName.description: String representation of the full name

reservationFolioWindowType.description: Folio window view which holds the set of folios for a reservation.

count.description: Indicates number of occurrences of the indicator.

housekeepingRoomStatusType.description: Simple type for room status instructions to be used in requests for fetching housekeeping rooms. Valid status values are Clean, Dirty, Pickup, Inspected, OutOfOrder, OutOfService.

searchMatchesType.description: List of Generic Name-Value-Pair Parameters used for super search matches.

searchMatchType.description: Search match indicating attribute and the matching value.

sourceOfSaleType.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

sourceType.description: Type of entity/channel who made the reservation..

sourceCode.description: The entity/channel who made the reservation.

waitlistResType.description: Information regarding why reservation is being /has been waitlisted.

description.description: Description why the reservation is being /has been waitlisted.

reservationQueueInformationType.description: Information regarding the Date, Duration and Priority of the reservation on Queue for Check in.

timeSpan.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

durationInSeconds.description: The total duration, in seconds, the reservation is on Queue.

guestTextInfo.description: Information for the message sent to the user

priority.description: The Queue Priority given to this reservation.

averageQueueTimeToCheckIn.description: The average time, in seconds, a reservation was on queue prior to Check-In.

averageQueueTimeCurrentReservations.description: The average time, in seconds, of the reservations currently in queue.

queueDate.description: The Business date on which the reservation was due to arrive and is currently placed on Queue for Check In.

queueTextInfoType.description: Information regarding the message sent to guest.

sentTime.description: Time the text was last sent to the user.

sentBy.description: User name of the user who sent message.

resHousekeepingType.description: Holds housekeeping turndown service information for the room.

facilityTaskInfo.description: The facility task applicable for the current day. This will be information only and not used for any updates.

linenChange.description: Indicates if a linen change is necessary.

turndownRequested.description: Indicates whether guest wants turndown facility or not.

serviceTime.description: This is the Turndown room service time.

expectedServiceTime.description: Expected Start Time for housekeeping task(s).

roomStatus.description: Current room status. Current room status is populated only if room is assigned to the reservation and reservation is due in or in house.

facilityTaskType.description: Information regarding facility task on a reservation.

date.description: The Date on which the task is applicable.

housekeepingTaskCodeType.description: Information related to a Task Code. Task Codes are used to generate task sheets in Rooms Management.

facilityDepartureTask.description: Indicates if this task code is the default departure task for Facility Tasks. This requires

linenChange.description: Indicates if a linen change is necessary.

hotelId.description: Property where this task code is configured.

facilityCodeType.description: Facility Housekeeping Code, its description and quantity.

revenuesAndBalances.description: Revenues and Balances Amount summary for the reservation.

billingPrivileges.description: Billing privileges set on the reservation.

taxType.description: This stores the code for the type of tax calculation especially with tax exemption, etc.

bedTaxReporting.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

folioTexts.description: Additional text fields to display on the folio.

periodicFolio.description: Information regarding periodic folios set on the reservation.

compAccounting.description: Information regarding comp accounting on the reservation.

reservationPreConfiguredRoutingInstructi.description: Information regarding the selected preconfigured routing instruction on the reservation.

financiallyResponsible.description: The guest from whom payment has to be recovered (direct guest).

proratedBilling.description: In case of Appartment style billing indicates whether a prorated amount should be used for an Apartment Style Billing rate.

lastRoomAndTaxPostedDate.description: Date of the last Room And Tax posting. Used primarily to know the date in case of Advance Billing.

reverseCheckInAllowed.description: This attribute is to verify if reverse check-in is allowed for the reservation.

reverseAdvanceCheckInAllowed.description: This attribute is to verify if reverse advance check-in is allowed for the reservation.

transactionsPosted.description: Specifies whether reservation has a financial transaction associated with it.

resRevenueBalanceType.description: Revenue and Balance Amount summary for the reservation.

totalFixedCharge.description: Total Fixed Charges on the reservation.

totalPayment.description: Total payment received for the reservation.

roomRevenue.description: Room Revenue generated by the reservation.

foodAndBevRevenue.description: Food and Beverage Revenue generated by the reservation.

otherRevenue.description: Other Revenue generated by the reservation.

nonRevenue.description: Total Non Revenue posted on the reservation.

totalRevenue.description: Total Revenue generated by the reservation.

billingPrivilegesType.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

postingRestriction.description: Flag used by interface program during check in.

preStayCharging.description: Indicates if the reservation has charging privileges before arrival.

postStayCharging.description: Indicates if the reservation has charging privileges after checkout.

folioCloseDate.description: Date when folio was closed. This works with PostStayCharging flag.

scheduledCheckout.description: Indicates if the guest is scheduled for automatic check out.

scheduledCheckoutTime.description: Time of automatic check out if guest is schedule for automatic check out.

directBillAuthorized.description: If Direct bill is authorized this will hold User ID who authorized it.

videoCheckout.description: Indicates if the guest can do video checkout

allowAutoCheckin.description: Indicated if a new reservation should be created and automatically checked in whenever the room is checked out. Available for pseudo room types only.

autoSettlement.description: Indicates if the is a candidate for auto folio settlement.

autoSettlementType.description: The folio settlement type for auto folio settlement.

autoSettlementFreq.description: The interval of days between each auto folio settlement.

creditLimitAutoPay.description: Indicates if the reservation will be included in the Automatic Credit Limit Overages process and also be listed in the Credit Limit Overages screen results.

reservationTaxTypeInfo.description: Provides information about the Tax Type.

collectingAgentTax.description: A boolean flag for Collecting Agent Tax

printAutoAdjust.description: Print auto adjust information for this tax type on the tax exempt report.

reportExemptDays.description: Number of days after which the guest will be tax exempt. Only used for tax exempt report.

reportTaxPercentage.description: Tax percentage. Only used for tax exempt report.

taxExemptNo.description: Tax exempt number on the profile.

bedTaxReportingType.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

taxRegistrationNo.description: Tax Registration Number for Maldives Bed Tax Reporting.

visaNumber.description: Visa number used for Maldives Bed Tax Reporting

visaIssueDate.description: Visa Issue Date used for Maldives Bed Tax Reporting.

visaExpiryDate.description: Visa Expiration Date used for Maldives Bed Tax Reporting

taxableDays.description: Number of days for which the Maldives tax is applicable.

folioTextsType.description: This stores the description for the type of tax calculation especially with tax exemption, etc.

text.description: Additional text field to display on the folio.

row.description: Row number of the additional text.

resPeriodicFolioType.description: Information regarding periodic folios set on the reservation.

lastSettlementDate.description: Latest date when a direct bill settlement was automatically done using the "Direct Bill Batch Folios" option.

lastFolioDate.description: Latest date when a folio was printed using the "Periodic Batch Folios" option

frequency.description: Frequency in number of days when folios should be printed for this reservation.

resCompAccountingType.description: Information regarding comp accounting on the reservation.

compType.description: Code used to identify the casino comp type and ranking of a guest.

authorizer.description: ID of the employee who will act as the host for this guest.

compPostings.description: Indicates if the Comp Billing/posting Exist

resPreConfiguredRoutingInstrType.description: Instruction to attach Pre-Configured Routing Instructions to a Reservation.

authorizerInfo.description: The authorizer information for Promotion Code with attached Complimentary Routing

ratePlanCode.description: Rate Code with attached Routing Instruction.

profileType.description: Profile Type with attached Routing Instruction.

promotionCode.description: Promotion Code with attached Complimentary Routing.

authorizerUserName.description: Application user name of the authorizer

inheritAuthorizerRateCode.description: Indicates whether user has the choice to have reservation inherit rate code from the authorizer.

taxTypeType.description: Provides information about the Tax Type.

collectingAgentTax.description: A boolean flag for Collecting Agent Tax

printAutoAdjust.description: Print auto adjust information for this tax type on the tax exempt report.

reportExemptDays.description: Number of days after which the guest will be tax exempt. Only used for tax exempt report.

reportTaxPercentage.description: Tax percentage. Only used for tax exempt report.

hasPaid.description: Resolves whether reservation has paid deposit.

hasOutstanding.description: Resolves whether reservation has outstanding deposit.

reservationAllowedActionType.description: Flag indicating whether the Enrollment is in progress or not for the Profile associated with this Reservation.

reservationInterfaceStatusType.description: Hotel Interface Type for a reservation and status of the various services

hotelInterface.description: Hotel interface information for the reservation

interfaceRights.description: Contains a list of status/rights for the various services under this interface

interfaceId.description: Unique DB internal number of a Hotel Interface record.

interfaceType.description: Three letter code for each interface that identifies the interface.

logo.description: Hotel Interface Logo. On the database, this is also referred as DBF Logo. This is a three letter code followed by an underscore(_). This tells us which DBF files and log files with the prefix that IFC7 is going to create.

machineName.description: Unique machine name of the running IFC.

status.description: The current status of the IFC.

activeFlag.description: Indicator if the Hotel Interface is active or not. This is different from the Interface Status, which is either STOPPED or RUNNING.

hotelInterfaceStatusType.description: Status of the Hotel Interface either STOPPED or RUNNING.

right.description: Internal code for each allowed right of a Hotel Interface record.

statusCode.description: User defined code for an Interface Right.

description.description: User defined description for an Interface Right.

category.description: Category code of this interface right.

allowed.description: Indicates if turndown is allowed or not

status.description: Indicates turndown status, values could be required, not required, completed

turndownStatusType.description: Simple type for turndown status instructions to be used in requests for fetching housekeeping rooms. Valid status values are Required, Not Required and Completed.

resMobileNotificationsType.description: Contains the status of Room Ready and Key Ready messages.

roomReady.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready message. It can have one of the values:PENDING, COMPLETED or FAILED

keyReady.description: Denotes the status of Key Ready message. It can have one of the values:PENDING, COMPLETED or FAILED

checkoutMessageReceived.description: Indicates if the Mobile checkout message is received.

requiresAction.description: Indicates if user action is required. The action could be for sending Room Ready or Key Ready Notification. It could also be for initiating Checkout

errorMessage.description: Error message when Mobile Notification has failed.

communicationStatusType.description: Enum to denote the Status of Readiness messages sent to Guest Devices.

telephoneInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on telephone/fax for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

emails.description: List of email address for the customer.

emailInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on an eMail address for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

telephoneInfoType.description: Information on a telephone number for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

telephoneType.description: Information on a telephone number for the customer.

phoneTechType.description: Indicates type of technology associated with this telephone number, such as Voice, Data, Fax, Pager, Mobile, TTY, etc.

phoneUseType.description: Describes the type of telephone number, in the context of its general use (e.g. Home, Business, Emergency Contact, Travel Arranger, Day, Evening).

phoneNumber.description: Telephone number assigned to a single location.

extension.description: Extension to reach a specific party at the phone number.

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

emailInfoType.description: Information on an email for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

advanceCheckInType.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

advanceCheckedIn.description: Indicates if the reservation is marked as Advance Checked In

pMS_ResStatusType.description: This reservation is in checked in status and the business date is past departure date. This could occur when ORS and PMS are in same environment.

resAccessRestrictionType.description: Indicates any Updates/Changes on the reservation as well as Reservation Cancellation are not allowed.

folioWindowType.description: A folio window view which holds the set of folios for a reservation.

debitRevenue.description: Revenue debit amount of the window.

debitPayment.description: Payment debit amount of the window.

debitBalance.description: Running debit balance of the window.

exchange.description: Available when the Fetch Folio Search Type requests the amounts to be converted to a currency different from the Resort currency.

paymentMethod.description: Defined method of payment for this window.

compAccountingInfo.description: Defined comp accounting configuration for this window

fiscalResponseType.description: Provides information which is used for fiscal response processing.

fiscalFolioInstruction.description: Defines the action of the generate folio process.

vATOffsetAmount.description: VAT offset amount of the window.

serviceTypeInfo.description: Contains service type information associated with transaction code posted in folio window.

internalFolioWindowID.description: Internal window ID which is unique to the reservation. This ID can only be used for reference.

emptyFolio.description: Flag to notify if the current folio has any postings.

emptyWindow.description: Flag to notify if the entire window has any postings.

simpleFolio.description: This flag signifies that generated Folio is Normal or Simple Folio. Certain countries of the World mandate a simple folio when the invoice amount is less than defined threshold.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

folioWindowExchangeAmounts.description: Converted folio windows values for the Exchange Currency requested.

revenue.description: The converted Folio Window Revenue Amount.

payment.description: The converted Folio Window Payment Amount.

balance.description: The converted Folio Window Total Amount.

authorizerUserName.description: Application user name of the authorizer

inheritAuthorizerRateCode.description: Indicates whether user has the choice to have reservation inherit rate code from the authorizer.

aRNumber.description: AR Account Number of the authorizer

compTypeCode.description: The Comp Type for this Account. Used when using the Comp types functionality

compVoucherNo.description: The coupon or voucher number used by the external gaming system to track postings made to this routing.

dateRange.description: Arrival date range for comp routing

membershipNameOnCard.description: Name displayed on the membership card

dateRangeType.description: Date Range with Start and End dates.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

fiscalResponseType.description: Provides information which is used for fiscal response processing.

folioSeqId.description: Fiscal Folio sequence ID stored in queue table.

retryFiscalPrinting.description: Flag to do the retrieval process of fiscal printing or not.

fiscalFolioInstruction.description: Action to generate Offline folio when no reponse is received from fiscal service.

folioType.description: Represents a single page in a reservation's ledger which will contain transactions and payee information.

allowConvertFolioYn.description: Flag to check Folio Conversion Allowed.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

invoiceNo.description: Invoice No after the folio is generated. Same invoice number may be referred in multiple folios

fiscalBillNo.description: The Fiscal Bill number of this posting

folioTypeName.description: The name of the Folio Type used for the Folio Number sequence.

internalFolioWindowID.description: Internal window ID which is unique to the reservation. This ID can only be used for reference.

folioNoWithPrefix.description: The folio number with prefix value.

folioSeqNo.description: Unique sequence number. Used to identify the current folio tax record.

folioStatusType.description: The Folio Status Example: DEPOSIT folio, VOID folio or the default OK folio status.

serviceType.description: Contains service type code attached with transaction code.

revenue.description: Revenue amount of the service type.

payment.description: Payment amount of the service type.

balance.description: Running balance of the service type.

totalPostings.description: Running total number of the service type.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

tags.name: Cashiering
tags.description: Cashiering module provides APIs to service front desk billing requirements, as well as any requirements related to a reservation's folio. You can retrieve a guest folio, post billing charges to guest folio, add routing instructions to a reservation, view authorization history, all the way through to checking the guest out using the postCheckOut API.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
